Body:
pn = op.network.Cubic(shape=[5, 5, 5])
geo1 = op.geometry.GenericGeometry(network=pn, pores=pn.Ps[:75], throats=pn
    .Ts[:75])
geo2 = op.geometry.GenericGeometry(network=pn, pores=pn.Ps[75:], throats=pn
    .Ts[75:])
geo1['pore.foo.bar'] = 1
geo1['pore.foo.baz'] = 2
d = pn['pore.foo']
assert len(d) == 2
assert 'pore.foo.bar' in d.keys()
assert 'pore.foo.baz' in d.keys()
assert np.any(np.isnan(d['pore.foo.bar']))
assert np.any(np.isnan(d['pore.foo.baz']))
geo2['pore.foo.bar'] = 1
geo2['pore.foo.baz'] = 2
d = pn['pore.foo']
assert np.all(~np.isnan(d['pore.foo.bar']))
assert np.all(~np.isnan(d['pore.foo.baz']))
